summary: An ordinance relating to and regulating plumbing and plumbing systems including lawn sprinkler systems; providing for a Plumbing Advisory Board, and a Plumbing Examining Board; requiring licenses and permits; prescribing fees, fixing penalties, and repealing Ordinances Nos. 80242, 80624, 80719, 81481, 81502, 81990, 82091, 83176, 83177, 83362, 81563, 83791, 83793, 85220, 86980, 87268, 89716 & 89795.
